Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.constants

Class Const

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.constants.Const
public final class Const extends Object
Utility class containing application-wide constants. Provides fixed values used throughout the application.
